docs.snippet: China was mentioned only in broad terms when President Trump announced plans to impose tariffs on steel and aluminum imports. But the world’s largest maker of steel was a major driver behind the action.

headline.main: The U.S. Wants to Take On China With Trade. The Rest of the World Will Be Caught in the Middle.

docs.snippet: Factbox on Australian opening batsman Cameron Bancroft, who was banned for nine months by Cricket Australia on Wednesday in the wake of the ball-tampering scandal in South Africa.

Acquisitive Chinese conglomerate Fosun International, which owns Club Med and a stake in Cirque du Soleil within its broad portfolio, aims to invest at least 20 billion yuan ($3.2 billion) in technology in the next three years.

headline.print_headline: China's Fosun Aims to Invest $3.2 Billion in Technology Over Three Years
headline.main: China's Fosun Aims to Invest $3.2 Billion in Technology Over Three Years

docs.snippet: Australia's long held belief that they play their cricket "hard but fair" would appear to have little truck outside their own country if the splenetic reaction to the Cape Town ball-tampering scandal is anything to go by.

headline.print_headline: 'Repeat Offenders' Australia Face Scorn Over Ball-Tampering Shame
headline.main: 'Repeat Offenders' Australia Face Scorn Over Ball-Tampering Shame

docs.snippet: The couple, who met while working at Bonhams in New York, were married in San Antonio.
Blackstone Group is buying stakes in two major office properties in central Mumbai as part of a deal with Indiabulls Real Estate, two sources with knowledge of the transaction said on Sunday.

headline.print_headline: Blackstone's Indiabulls Deal Includes Two Mumbai Office Properties: Sources
headline.main: Blackstone's Indiabulls Deal Includes Two Mumbai Office Properties: Sources

docs.snippet: U.S. technology giant Apple Inc and India's telecoms regulator are at loggerheads over the development of a government anti-spam mobile application, with user privacy at the heart of a deepening rift between the two sides.

headline.print_headline: Rift Deepens Between Apple, India's Telecom Regulator Over Anti-Spam App
headline.main: Rift Deepens Between Apple, India's Telecom Regulator Over Anti-Spam App

docs.snippet: Reaction after deposed Australian captain Steve Smith, opening batsman Cameron Bancroft and coach Darren Lehmann held news conferences in the wake of last week's ball-tampering scandal in Cape Town.

headline.print_headline: Factbox-How the World Reacted to Smith, Bancroft and Lehmann
headline.main: Factbox-How the World Reacted to Smith, Bancroft and Lehmann

docs.snippet: Britain's biggest supermarket chain Tesco said on Tuesday the price of its own brand fizzy drinks will not increase after a sugar levy comes into force this week as they already fall below a government-imposed threshold.

headline.print_headline: Tesco Says Own-Brand Soft Drink Prices Will Not Rise After Sugar Levy
headline.main: Tesco Says Own-Brand Soft Drink Prices Will Not Rise After Sugar Levy

docs.snippet: Team by team analysis of Sunday's Australian Formula One Grand Prix (teams listed in championship order):

headline.print_headline: Team by Team Analysis of Australian Grand Prix
